alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Back (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 30 at 6:29AM MST until December 31 at 9:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 14 inches with higher amounts possible in the Ogden Valley. * WHERE...Wasatch Back. * WHEN...Until 9 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions, including snow packed roads and reduced visibilities, can be expected at times from Wednesday evening through Friday evening. The hazardous conditions could impact peak commute times, especially the Thursday morning and evenings commutes as well as the Friday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
